code: CompletionQuery toQuery() {     CompletionFieldMapper.CompletionFieldType fieldType = getFieldType().     final CompletionQuery query.     if (getPrefix() != null) {         query = createCompletionQuery(getPrefix(), fieldType).     } else if (getRegex() != null) {         if (fuzzyOptions != null) {             throw new IllegalArgumentException("can not use 'fuzzy' options with 'regex").         }         if (regexOptions == null) {             regexOptions = RegexOptions.builder().build().         }         query = fieldType.regexpQuery(getRegex(), regexOptions.getFlagsValue(), regexOptions.getMaxDeterminizedStates()).     } else if (getText() != null) {         query = createCompletionQuery(getText(), fieldType).     } else {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("'prefix/text' or 'regex' must be defined").     }     if (fieldType.hasContextMappings()) {         ContextMappings contextMappings = fieldType.getContextMappings().         return contextMappings.toContextQuery(query, queryContexts).     }     return query. }

private CompletionQuery createCompletionQuery(BytesRef prefix, CompletionFieldMapper.CompletionFieldType fieldType) {     final CompletionQuery query.     if (fuzzyOptions != null) {         query = fieldType.fuzzyQuery(prefix.utf8ToString(), Fuzziness.fromEdits(fuzzyOptions.getEditDistance()), fuzzyOptions.getFuzzyPrefixLength(), fuzzyOptions.getFuzzyMinLength(), fuzzyOptions.getMaxDeterminizedStates(), fuzzyOptions.isTranspositions(), fuzzyOptions.isUnicodeAware()).     } else {         query = fieldType.prefixQuery(prefix).     }     return query. }
